mapper.insert: insert into coverage_result_serial_number(id, serial_id, `server_name`, version_number, `status`, phase,handle_user, business_direction, coverage_rate, total_Line, report_url, generate_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverageRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{generateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update coverage_result_serial_number set serial_id = #{serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `server_name` = #{serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_number = #{versionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `phase` = #{phase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_user = #{handleUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_direction = #{businessDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coverage_rate = #{coverageRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_Line = #{totalLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_url = #{reportUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, generate_time = #{generateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update coverage_result_serial_number set
coverage_rate = #{coverageDO2.coverageRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_Line = #{coverageDO2.totalLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_url = #{coverageDO2.reportUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
generate_time = NOW() where serial_id = #{coverageDO2.serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.select: select id, serial_id, `server_name`, version_number, `status`, phase,`start_time`,`end_time`, handle_user, business_direction, coverage_rate, total_Line, report_url, generate_time, is_delete from coverage_result_serial_number where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
